title: OOo vs. Office 2007
body: <p>The difference in interfaces is depressing...</p><table><thead><tr><th></th><th>Office 2007</th><th>OOo 2.0</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><th>word processing</th><td><a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/photos/jensenh/images/547376/original.aspx"><img src="http://www.sunflowerhead.com/msimages/Word_thumb.jpg" alt="Word 2007" /></a></td><td><a href="http://static.flickr.com/38/110342637_26ff48889d_o.png"><img src="http://static.flickr.com/38/110342637_26ff48889d_m.jpg" alt="Writer" /></a></td></tr><tr><th>spreadsheet</th><td><a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/photos/jensenh/images/547377/original.aspx"><img src="http://www.sunflowerhead.com/msimages/Excel_thumb.jpg" alt="Excel2007" /></a></td><td><a href="http://static.flickr.com/52/110342597_edbd4eb9f0_o.png"><img src="http://static.flickr.com/52/110342597_edbd4eb9f0_m.jpg" alt="Calc" /></a></td></tr><tr><th>presentation</th><td><a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/photos/jensenh/images/547378/original.aspx"><img src="http://www.sunflowerhead.com/msimages/PowerPoint_thumb.jpg" alt="PowerPoint 2007" /></a></td><td><a href="http://static.flickr.com/40/110342624_50ece67fec_o.png"><img src="http://static.flickr.com/40/110342624_50ece67fec_m.jpg" alt="Impress" /></a></td></tr><tr><th>database</th><td><a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/photos/jensenh/images/547380/original.aspx"><img src="http://www.sunflowerhead.com/msimages/Access_thumb.jpg" alt="Access 2007" /></a></td><td><a href="http://static.flickr.com/41/110342582_2cfde04e6e_o.png"><img src="http://static.flickr.com/41/110342582_2cfde04e6e_m.jpg" alt="Base" /></a></td></tr><tr><th>misc</th><td><a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/photos/jensenh/images/547379/original.aspx"><img src="http://www.sunflowerhead.com/msimages/OutlookSendMail_thumb.jpg" alt="Outlook 2007" /></a></td><td><a href="http://static.flickr.com/51/110342614_f3af6989c6_o.png"><img src="http://static.flickr.com/51/110342614_f3af6989c6_m.jpg" alt="Draw" /></a></td></tr></tbody></table><p>There's more info on the interfaces on <a href="http://blogs.msdn.com/jensenh/archive/2006/03/09/547281.aspx">Jensen's blog</a>. I also have a <a href="http://www.flickr.com/photos/diesel_travis/sets/72057594078821101/">set of the OOo screenshots on Flickr</a>. Also: <a href="http://www.lipsum.com/">Lipsum rocks!</a></p>
